CustomField.formula: HYPERLINK('/' + BLANKVALUE(Parent.Parent.Parent.Parent.Parent.Parent.Id, BLANKVALUE(Parent.Parent.Parent.Parent.Parent.Id, BLANKVALUE(Parent.Parent.Parent.Parent.Id, BLANKVALUE(Parent.Parent.Parent.Id, BLANKVALUE(Parent.Parent.Id, BLANKVALUE(Parent.Id, Null)))))), BLANKVALUE(Parent.Parent.Parent.Parent.Parent.Parent.Name, BLANKVALUE(Parent.Parent.Parent.Parent.Parent.Name, BLANKVALUE(Parent.Parent.Parent.Parent.Name, BLANKVALUE(Parent.Parent.Parent.Name, BLANKVALUE(Parent.Parent.Name, BLANKVALUE(Parent.Name, Null)))))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field shows the Parent Campaign located at the very top of the Campaign Hierarchy. This value cannot be exported into reports, instead you can use "Ultimate Parent Account (Text)" when adding this field to your report
CustomField.label: Ultimate Parent Campaign
